ai-patthana9.4:0.2_0: It is manifested as a responsible dawn, unintelligent to the Dhamma.
ai-patthana9.4:0.3_0: In the lower realms, the inner quarters (of the village),
ai-patthana9.4:1.1_0: You shouldn’t go to the Dhamma for growing old,
ai-patthana9.4:2.1_0: He should not give a teaching to all,
ai-patthana9.4:3.1_0: for gossip, there is no unpleasant result.
ai-patthana9.4:4.1_0: You shouldn’t recite the teaching with a trainee,
ai-patthana9.4:5.1_0: You shouldn’t give a teaching to all, there is no new pack ...
ai-patthana9.4:6.1_0: He shouldn’t follow the authority of an adept. Instead, there is no nine kinds of trainees.
ai-patthana9.4:7.1_0: He’s not able to teach the Dhamma that’s new.
ai-patthana9.4:8.1_0: We shouldn’t recite the Teaching, nor grow in every respect.
ai-patthana9.4:9.1_0: for you’re not able to settle a limited period.
ai-patthana9.4:10.1_0: for one who isn’t able to teach the Dhamma that has arisen in him.
ai-patthana9.4:11.1_0: It’s not newly ordained for the sake of opposite sex. It’s dependent on all sides.
ai-patthana9.4:12.1_0: for one who is not able to teach Dhamma for the sake of heaven;
ai-patthana9.4:13.1_0: You don’t give rise to new things.
ai-patthana9.4:14.1_0: He’s not able to newly ordained; there is no new sitting in all directions.
ai-patthana9.4:15.1_0: for you haven’t done enough to teach the Dhamma to nine perfected ones.
ai-patthana9.4:16.1_0: He should not give rise to the news, and there is no new action that is present,
ai-patthana9.4:17.1_0: He’s not able to newly ordained about the teaching, nor can all come out?
ai-patthana9.4:18.1_0: for you’re not able to teach the Dhamma for new ... there is no nine results.
ai-patthana9.4:19.1_0: On the way isn’t able to teach the Dhamma, there is no new meeting places,
ai-patthana9.4:20.1_0: for not recognizing an offense, nor for the sake of all paths,
ai-patthana9.4:22.1_0: Putting the teaching, you should not give rise to newly come to all.
ai-patthana9.4:23.1_0: You shouldn’t give rise to new things.
ai-patthana9.4:24.1_0: for you’re not able to teach the Dhamma that’s new.
ai-patthana9.4:25.1_0: He’s not able to teach the Dhamma that’s new,
ai-patthana9.4:26.1_0: He doesn’t give rise to new dependence on the teaching. Everywhere there is no new state of existence in all directions.
ai-patthana9.4:27.1_0: It’s not influence for the sake of a new state,
ai-patthana9.4:29.1_0: You shouldn’t give rise to newly ordained that’s not intimidated.
ai-patthana9.4:30.1_0: He should not give a teaching to all, there is no new breath,
ai-patthana9.4:31.1_0: Not for the sake of establishing, based on the teaching,
ai-patthana9.4:32.1_0: and you won’t give rise to new discontent with the spiritual life.
